name: The Mysterious Machine
description:
Hey,

Remember that machine I was telling you about? Well here it is. I don't know what it's doing under the hood, but I put blocks on it, press submit, and it spits out numbers. Can you do anything with it?

Don't forget to take notes with your notebook as you go along.

Please contact me somehow if you can solve level 10.

Discuss with others at the SKYLE discord!

-- 

Stuck?

Have you tried using your mouse to select a block in the tray, and put it on the board?

Have you tried looking at the example on the left? The example is always there to teach you something.

Have you tried playing around with the blocks even if you got the right answer? There's still plenty to learn.

Have you tried using the notebook? Right click on any block to bring it up.

Have you tried talking to others on the SKYLE discord?
